text:
Idea: make it so you can have a theme in “staging mode” so it’s ONLY available to the builder in staging. 

We’re deploying a large site and themes takes over the ui for website page creation. We don’t want the client (they don’t want their team to either) to use the theme until it’s fully qa’d.
theme google font fields are not adding `&display=swap` to the call to `<http://fonts.google.com|fonts.google.com>`… Can we get that added in there?
Or is there a reason its not in there? Like layout shift type stuff or something?
